item.title: The Inner Game
item.description: Here, I’m documenting my conversations with my wish - 10-year project. üîñ ‚òØÔ∏è The growth in life is a process of integrating yin and yang. It is constantly changing, balancing, and integrating. üîñ Two Worlds The calendar years 2022 - 2023 are the milestones for my spiritual growth. I feel and see that there are two systems. The visible one is created by human beings over ages, where everyone sort of finds a path to follow.
